title: sometimes i really get annoyed at this game
body: I was b1 when the reset started, I won 7 out of my 10 promotion games yet i ended up getting b4 i know i will slowly get back to where i was but why was i put in such a low rank?

replies.body: I know someone that won 9/10 placements and was still b5...total BS
the most annoying part is having to go through so many games just to get back to where i was

I'm 4/3 in my Provisionals. Still being matched with Master Tier and Diamond. I lost a game and my 100% win rate because of a power outage. What's annoying is if you leave a game it apparently counts as two games. That mean's I've lost 2 games in my provisionals by default. The 3rd loss is because I just played shet.
